message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I still think this product is worth more than $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $11500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
